Later, Iris arrives and informs Becca that she needs to save Edward by showing him that she is still alive, as the Zolturi are currently partying at the prom due to the St. Salvatore theme. However, Jacob appears and demands that Becca choose between him and Edward before she announces her decision, but he is distracted by a cat and runs off to chase it.
